Early Warning

Fast and accurate alerts to the right people is of the utmost importance during an emergency. AidIQ creates notification systems which help mitigate impact and speed response.

SAMBRO

Sahana Alerting and Messaging Broker (SAMBRO) is a template to support Alerting workflows.

Alert Publishing

Alerts are defined from templates & assigned tor specific Geographic areas (either pre-defined or ad-hoc). They are then Approved & Distributed via the CAP open standard, as well as simple RSS.

Alert Subscription

Alerts can be subscribed to by Category &/or Geographic area. Alerts are transmitted via Email, SMS &/or Push Notifications to a Mobile App.

Case Studies

  • SAMBRO. National Disaster Management Centre of Maldives
  • SAMBRO. National Department of Meteorology and Hydrology of Myanmar
  • SAMBRO. National Disaster Management Centre of Philippines
